1.1.name: wordpress/wordpress-easy-slides
1.1.description:
Wordpress Easy Slides will generate a section in wordpress page or post where sildes show automatically.It is a easy use and lightweight plugin to make the pages Lively and colorful. Wordpress Easy Slides plugin uses jQuery which included in wordpress without adding another library from outside.

Please search and submit your transaltion here: http://www.awandou.com/?p=1271
